about_the_game:
Q: At what point does a cat become a human?
A. The cat is dreaming
B. This is the adventure I've been waiting for to change my boring life!
C. Cats are inherently human, and humans don't think they exist until they observe them
D. The magical world invades reality! One leak of magic and all hell breaks loose


I don't know. But I became my owner and she became me.
Now that a cat turns into a human, isn't it normal for other weird things to happen?
Such as Ahem, can't reveal the plot.
In short, it is a cat disguised as a human, fun, one-day adventure story!


"If you don't change your attitude, you'll live the same life as you do now, no matter what opportunities come your way."
"Well, don't think too much about it. Go and try it first."
"She will be as happy a tree as you could ever hope for."


> Bizarre events intertwine with ordinary life, and the reasons behind Cat Meow's transformation into a human is waiting for you to discover!
> Huh? Here's a puzzle. Solve it. What is it? - Solve the puzzle, find Song's diary , maybe you will know something.
> Interesting NPCS! (ps: I love a character, here to avoid revealing the plot first, want to know can be asked me.)
>Four endings, what is the life of Meow and Song after this day? (ps: There is an Easter egg behind the true ending // proud face //)
> Cute kitten Meow prototype for the creator's kitten Journey( By the way, Journey and Song, their Chinese name "且行且歌" means "to sing while walking"), the game has hidden Journey's photos (≧ω≦)/ (definitely not with private goods).
> The story is based on the real experience of the creator (with some processing), I hope it will resonate with you.
detailed_description:
Q: At what point does a cat become a human?
A. The cat is dreaming
B. This is the adventure I've been waiting for to change my boring life!
C. Cats are inherently human, and humans don't think they exist until they observe them
D. The magical world invades reality! One leak of magic and all hell breaks loose


I don't know. But I became my owner and she became me.
Now that a cat turns into a human, isn't it normal for other weird things to happen?
Such as Ahem, can't reveal the plot.
In short, it is a cat disguised as a human, fun, one-day adventure story!


"If you don't change your attitude, you'll live the same life as you do now, no matter what opportunities come your way."
"Well, don't think too much about it. Go and try it first."
"She will be as happy a tree as you could ever hope for."


> Bizarre events intertwine with ordinary life, and the reasons behind Cat Meow's transformation into a human is waiting for you to discover!
> Huh? Here's a puzzle. Solve it. What is it? - Solve the puzzle, find Song's diary , maybe you will know something.
> Interesting NPCS! (ps: I love a character, here to avoid revealing the plot first, want to know can be asked me.)
>Four endings, what is the life of Meow and Song after this day? (ps: There is an Easter egg behind the true ending // proud face //)
> Cute kitten Meow prototype for the creator's kitten Journey( By the way, Journey and Song, their Chinese name "且行且歌" means "to sing while walking"), the game has hidden Journey's photos (≧ω≦)/ (definitely not with private goods).
> The story is based on the real experience of the creator (with some processing), I hope it will resonate with you.
name: CAT'S DREAM

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: CAT'S DREAM is a pixel-style puzzle game in which players take on the role of Cat Meow that turns into a human, on a fantasy one-day adventure. The reason for all this seems to have something to do with her owner Song...
